titleSection.name: VersionOne LDAPSync Integration
titleSection.shortDescription: The LDAP synchronization tool allows an organization to synchronize their VersionOne Member list with users that belong to a specified LDAP group.

descriptionSection.description: The LDAP synchronization tool allows an organization to synchronize their VersionOne Member list with users that belong to a specified LDAP group. The tool assumes that the list of users in the LDAP group is the master list, and adds or removes users from VersionOne accordingly. When users are added they are sent an email with VersionOne connection information and, if VersionOne is configured for VersionOne Authentication, a randomly generated password.

updates.releaseNotes: Updated: Integration depends on the latest SDK
Fixed: VersionOne username matching should be case insensitive

qualityBands.name: mature
qualityBands.shortDesc: The product is stable. The code will continue to evolve with minimum breaking changes.
